skills.description: The portfolio you are watching is also created with Next.js, a library based on React.js, and Typescript. I have created a lot of React applications.
Javascript is probably one of the most flexible programming languages in the world. I usually code with Node.js and Express to create my Back-end applications.

I believe that a smartphone is the most valuable device invented in 21st century that allows programmers to create their ideas in real life. I started coding with Galaxy S II when I was younger and have been creating various Android applications with Java, Kotlin since then.
